Package com.game.core.scene.areas

Class KillableArea

java.lang.Object
com.game.core.behaviour.base.PositionWrapper
com.game.core.behaviour.base.GameObject
com.game.core.scene.areas.Area
com.game.core.scene.areas.KillableArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
Positionable
public class KillableArea extends Area
Represents an area in the game where entities can take damage. This area uses TakeDamageEffect to apply damage to entities that enter its bounds.
